親父不為其子媒。¶	KR2c0021_112:60b:1:11:1,KR3k0012_541:9a:12:4:7,KR3k0012_999:9a:12:4:12376,KR3k0045_087:9b:1:9:3,KR4d0204_016:13b:5:4:10,KR5c0126_027:1a:7:1:1,KR5c0138_009:9a:1:13:2

不若非其父者也；¶	KR2c0021_112:60b:2:1:1,KR3k0045_087:9b:1:20:3,KR3k0057_012:16a:6:29:230,KR3k0058_082:2a:5:38:2,KR5c0051_009:12a:3:7:1,KR5c0126_027:1a:9:1:1,KR5c0127_089:001a:6:2:2,KR5c0128_028:001a:6:2:2,KR5c0135_026:001b:2:3:5,KR5c0136_016:001a:9:2:2,KR5c0138_009:9a:1:24:2,KR5c0139_029:002a:10:12:4,KR5h0057_007:001a:5:2:1,KR5i0036_005:05p011a:10:14:5
非吾罪也，¶	KR2b0019_372:2b:8:2:2,KR2c0021_112:60b:2:8:1,KR4d0082_019:1a:1:104630:678,KR4d0082_021:22a:0:139:666,KR4d0082_036:22a:0:139:8,KR4d0204_016:13b:5:11:10,KR4h0147_052:20b:4:13:15,KR5c0051_009:12a:4:1:1,KR5c0126_027:1a:10:1:1,KR5c0127_089:001a:6:9:2,KR5c0128_028:001a:6:9:2,KR5c0135_026:001b:2:10:5,KR5c0135_026:001b:8:7:5,KR5c0136_016:001a:9:9:2,KR5c0138_009:9a:2:28:2,KR5c0139_029:002b:6:1:5,KR5d0080_000:015a:8:13:1,KR5h0057_007:001a:5:9:1,KR5i0036_005:05p011a:10:21:5

與己同則應，¶	KR2c0021_112:60b:2:16:1,KR5c0051_009:12a:5:4:1,KR5c0126_027:1a:12:1:1,KR5c0127_089:001a:6:17:2,KR5c0135_026:001b:3:1:5,KR5c0139_029:003a:1:1:5,KR5h0057_007:001a:5:17:1
不與己同則反；¶	KR2c0021_112:60b:2:21:1,KR5c0051_009:12a:6:5:1,KR5c0126_027:1a:13:1:1,KR5c0127_089:001a:7:5:2,KR5c0128_028:001a:7:5:2,KR5c0135_026:001b:3:6:5,KR5c0136_016:001a:10:5:2,KR5c0139_029:003a:1:6:5,KR5h0057_007:001a:6:5:1
同於己為是之，¶	KR2c0021_112:60b:3:6:1,KR5c0126_027:1a:14:1:1,KR5c0138_009:9a:4:10:2
異於己為非之。¶	KR2c0021_112:60b:3:12:1,KR5c0126_027:1a:15:1:1,KR5c0138_009:9a:4:16:2

# dating: 8110

年先矣，¶

故曰言无言。¶	KR5c0126_027:2a:8:1:3

言无言，¶
終身言，¶

惡乎然？¶
然於然。¶

# dating: 8110
非巵言日出，¶	KR2c0021_112:61a:4:2:1,KR3k0056_002:15a:6:20:2,KR5c0051_009:13b:2:1:1,KR5c0106_007:004a:2:8:3,KR5c0126_027:2a:30:1:6,KR5c0127_089:001b:8:9:2,KR5c0127_089:005b:6:3:2,KR5c0128_028:004a:3:10:2,KR5c0135_026:002b:8:4:6,KR5c0135_026:003a:10:15:6,KR5c0136_016:002b:8:4:4,KR5c0138_009:10a:2:29:2,KR5c0139_029:006b:6:1:9,KR5h0057_007:001b:7:9:2,KR5i0036_005:05p012a:7:23:5

惠子曰：¶
「孔子勤志服知也。」¶	KR2b0017_072:12a:6:7:8,KR2c0021_112:61a:8:2:1,KR5c0051_009:14a:2:3:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:7:1:8,KR5c0127_089:010b:9:8:44,KR5c0128_028:004b:6:8:2,KR5c0135_026:003b:10:8:7,KR5c0136_016:003a:10:8:4,KR5c0138_009:10b:1:2:2,KR5c0139_029:008b:2:4:11,KR5h0057_007:003a:10:8:3,KR5i0036_005:05p012b:4:6:5

# dating: 8110
莊子曰：¶「孔子謝之矣，¶	KR2b0017_072:12a:6:14:8,KR2c0021_112:61a:8:9:1,KR5c0051_009:14a:2:10:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:8:1:9,KR5c0127_089:010b:9:15:44,KR5c0128_028:004b:6:15:2,KR5c0135_026:003b:10:15:7,KR5c0136_016:003a:10:15:4,KR5c0139_029:008b:8:1:11,KR5h0057_007:003a:10:15:3,KR5i0036_005:05p012b:4:27:5
而其未之嘗言？¶	KR2b0017_072:12a:7:1:8,KR2c0021_112:61a:8:17:1,KR5c0051_009:14a:3:2:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:10:1:9,KR5c0127_089:010b:10:6:44,KR5c0128_028:004b:7:6:2,KR5c0135_026:004a:1:6:7,KR5c0136_016:003b:1:6:5,KR5c0138_009:10b:2:12:2,KR5c0139_029:008b:8:9:11,KR5h0057_007:003b:1:6:4,KR5i0036_005:05p012b:5:9:5
孔子云：¶

吾心悲。」¶

# src: ZHUANG 27.3.2 Guo Qingfan 955; Wang Shumin 1099; Fang Yong 766; Chen Guying 734
# dating: 8110
弟子問于仲尼曰：¶	KR5c0051_009:14b:7:1:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:30:1:12,KR5c0127_090:001a:5:13:2,KR5c0128_028:006a:1:12:2,KR5c0135_026:004b:10:12:8,KR5c0136_016:004b:2:12:6,KR5c0139_029:011a:3:1:13
「若參者，¶
可謂无所縣其罪乎？」¶	KR5c0126_027:3a:32:1:12,KR5c0139_029:011a:3:11:13

# src: ZHUANG 27.3.3 Guo Qingfan 955; Wang Shumin 1099; Fang Yong 766; Chen Guying 734
# dating: 8110
曰：¶
「既已縣矣。¶	KR2c0021_095:32b:7:28:1,KR3k0045_115:6b:4:6:3,KR3k0056_090:21a:1:12:2,KR5c0126_027:3a:34:1:13,KR5c0128_028:006a:2:14:2,KR5c0128_028:006a:8:1:2,KR5c0135_026:005a:1:16:8,KR5c0138_009:11a:5:9:2,KR5c0139_029:011a:9:2:13,KR5h0057_007:004b:3:15:5
夫无所縣者，¶	KR5c0126_027:3a:35:1:13,KR5c0139_029:011b:1:1:14

生有為，¶
死也。¶
勸公，¶

眾罔兩問於影曰：¶	KR5c0126_027:3a:71:1:17
「若向也俯	KR2c0021_112:62a:4:2:1,KR3k0045_113:16b:4:9:4,KR5c0051_009:16b:1:8:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:72:1:17,KR5c0127_090:009a:7:8:44,KR5c0128_028:008b:4:8:2,KR5c0135_026:006b:7:8:10,KR5c0136_016:006b:2:8:8,KR5c0138_009:12a:6:29:2,KR5c0139_029:016a:10:8:18,KR5h0057_007:006a:7:9:6,KR5i0036_005:05p014a:4:2:5

向也括¶

何也？」¶

影曰：¶
「叟叟也，¶
奚稍問也！¶	KR2c0021_112:62a:5:18:1,KR3j0060_001:4b:8:21:2,KR3k0045_113:16b:6:8:4,KR5c0051_009:16b:4:3:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:80:1:18,KR5c0127_090:009a:9:11:44,KR5c0128_028:008b:6:13:2,KR5c0135_026:006b:9:11:10,KR5c0136_016:006b:4:11:8,KR5c0138_009:12a:8:15:2,KR5c0139_029:016b:7:6:19,KR5h0057_007:006a:9:12:6,KR5i0036_005:05p014a:5:22:5

火與日，¶
吾屯也；¶
陰與夜，¶
吾代也。¶

# src: ZHUANG 27.6.3 Guo Qingfan 960; Wang Shumin 1106; Fang Yong 770; Chen Guying 738
# dating: 8110
彼吾所以有待邪？¶	KR2c0021_112:62a:7:12:1,KR5c0126_027:3a:88:1:19,KR5c0128_028:008b:8:14:2,KR5c0128_028:009b:1:6:2,KR5c0135_026:007a:1:13:10,KR5c0136_016:006b:6:13:8,KR5c0139_029:017b:10:1:20
而況乎无待者乎！¶	KR5c0126_027:3a:89:1:19
彼來則我與之來，¶	KR4h0002_022:12b:6:42:29,KR5c0051_009:17a:2:1:2,KR5c0121_008:1b:2:12:0,KR5c0123_019:002b:4:4:10,KR5c0126_027:3a:90:1:19,KR5c0127_090:009b:2:11:44,KR5c0128_028:008b:9:12:2,KR5c0135_026:007a:2:11:10,KR5c0136_016:006b:7:11:8,KR5c0138_009:12b:5:1:2,KR5c0139_029:018b:1:1:21,KR5h0057_007:006b:2:13:7,KR5i0036_005:05p014b:2:10:5
彼往則我與之往，¶	KR2c0021_112:62a:8:13:1,KR4h0003_023:12a:1:52:9,KR5c0051_009:17a:3:4:2,KR5c0121_008:1b:2:19:0,KR5c0123_019:002b:3:13:10,KR5c0126_027:3a:91:1:19,KR5c0127_090:009b:3:1:44,KR5c0128_028:008b:10:2:2,KR5c0135_026:007a:3:1:10,KR5c0136_016:006b:8:1:8,KR5c0139_029:018b:1:8:21,KR5i0036_005:05p014b:2:17:5
彼強陽則我與之強陽。¶	KR5c0126_027:3a:92:1:19
強陽者又何以有問乎！」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_027-7a>¶	KR5c0126_027:3a:93:1:19

# src: ZHUANG 27.7.1 Guo Qingfan 962; Wang Shumin 1109; Fang Yong 772; Chen Guying 740
# dating: 8110
陽子居南之沛，¶	KR2b0017_075:1b:7:16:1,KR2d0023_004:4b:4:1:2,KR3k0012_186:3b:11:3:8,KR3k0012_999:3b:11:3:8553,KR3k0056_060:53a:1:16:5,KR3k0056_148:21b:5:4:5,KR4d0080_048:26b:8:19:81,KR5c0051_009:17a:5:1:2,KR5c0106_006:007a:3:4:4,KR5c0126_027:3a:94:1:20,KR5c0127_090:013a:4:1:68,KR5c0128_028:009b:8:1:2,KR5c0135_026:008a:2:1:11,KR5c0136_016:006b:9:9:8,KR5c0138_009:12b:6:29:2,KR5c0139_029:018b:8:1:21,KR5h0057_007:006b:9:1:7,KR5i0036_005:05p014b:5:45:5,KR6q0219_003:0049c:20:1:234
老聃西遊於秦，¶	KR4h0002_043:16b:6:5:11,KR5c0049_002:8a:1:15:1,KR5c0051_009:17a:5:7:2,KR5c0120_002:028b:8:6:2,KR5c0121_002:27a:8:6:0,KR5c0122_003:009a:9:6:2,KR5c0123_006:006b:8:6:1,KR5c0124_002:14a:65:1:80,KR5c0126_027:3a:95:1:20,KR5c0127_090:013a:4:7:68,KR5c0128_028:009b:8:7:2,KR5c0135_026:008a:2:7:11,KR5c0139_029:018b:8:7:21,KR5h0057_007:006b:9:7:7,KR5i0036_005:05p014b:6:18:5
邀於郊，¶
至於梁而遇老子。¶	KR5c0051_009:17a:6:2:2,KR5c0126_027:3a:97:1:20,KR5c0128_028:009b:8:16:2,KR5c0135_026:008a:3:2:11,KR5c0136_016:006b:10:7:8,KR5c0138_009:12b:7:14:2,KR5c0139_029:018b:8:16:21,KR5h0057_007:006b:9:16:7,KR5i0036_005:05p014b:6:27:5

「始以汝為可教，¶	KR2c0021_103:1a:5:11:1,KR2c0021_103:1a:7:9:1,KR2d0023_004:4b:5:11:2,KR3a0059_035:36b:4:19:2,KR3k0012_186:4a:1:14:8,KR3k0012_999:4a:1:14:8553,KR3k0056_060:53a:2:5:5,KR3k0056_148:21b:5:34:5,KR4c0022_024:11a:2:6:2,KR4c0022_024:11a:3:6:2,KR5c0124_002:14a:69:1:80,KR5c0124_002:14a:77:1:81,KR5c0125_002:20a:4:2:4,KR5c0125_002:20a:6:19:4,KR5c0126_027:3a:99:1:20,KR5c0138_009:12b:8:10:2
今不可也。」¶	KR2b0025_026:5b:1:11:0,KR2b0034_014:1b:8:2:1,KR2b0037_078:53a:7:16:0,KR2b0040_094:5a:4:3:6,KR2c0007_011:20a:3:6:4,KR2d0007_095:5b:8:6:1,KR2d0023_004:4b:5:17:2,KR2k0007_042:11a:3:10:4,KR2k0008_082:19b:1:8:7,KR2o0022_014:3a:5:18:12,KR3j0051_008:17b:7:2:0,KR3j0057_002:3b:5:1:0,KR3j0124_003:2b:6:10:2,KR3j0124_016:2b:6:10:39,KR3j0183_009:12a:8:7:4,KR3k0012_186:4a:1:20:8,KR3k0012_395:6a:9:2:10,KR3k0012_999:4a:1:20:8553,KR3k0012_999:6a:9:2:11150,KR3k0025_036:46b:7:8:34,KR3k0030_042:4b:8:39:2,KR3k0030_206:4a:8:25:2,KR3k0049_036:96b:5:20:11,KR3k0055_311:57a:7:13:9,KR3k0055_317:45a:1:7:8,KR3k0056_060:53a:2:11:5,KR3k0056_148:21b:5:40:5,KR3k0057_047:16a:6:13:222,KR3l0069_022:6a:2:5:0,KR3l0118_055:2a:2:10:4,KR4h0152_214:4a:7:16:4,KR5c0051_009:17a:7:7:2,KR5c0106_006:007a:4:16:4,KR5c0126_027:3a:100:1:20,KR5c0127_090:013a:6:3:68,KR5c0128_028:009b:10:4:2,KR5c0135_026:008a:4:7:11,KR5c0136_016:007a:1:12:8,KR5c0138_009:12b:8:16:2,KR5c0139_029:019a:4:16:21,KR5h0057_007:007a:1:4:7,KR5i0036_005:05p014b:7:19:5

陽子居不荅。¶	KR5c0051_009:17a:7:11:2,KR5c0126_027:3a:101:1:21
至舍，¶

今閒矣，¶
請問其過。」¶	KR2c0021_103:1a:8:17:1,KR2k0113_001:3a:5:26:9,KR3a0059_035:36b:7:13:2,KR3k0012_186:4a:3:20:8,KR3k0012_999:4a:3:20:8553,KR3k0058_103:11b:8:7:3,KR4c0022_024:11a:3:35:2,KR5c0049_002:8a:6:1:1,KR5c0051_009:17b:2:1:2,KR5c0106_006:007a:5:16:4,KR5c0120_002:029a:3:14:2,KR5c0120_002:029a:8:1:2,KR5c0121_002:27b:4:15:0,KR5c0122_003:009b:4:14:2,KR5c0123_006:007a:9:8:1,KR5c0124_002:14a:83:1:81,KR5c0125_002:20a:8:8:4,KR5c0126_027:3a:110:1:21,KR5c0127_090:013a:8:14:68,KR5c0128_028:010a:2:15:2,KR5c0128_028:010a:7:1:2,KR5c0135_026:008a:7:1:11,KR5c0139_029:019b:5:5:22,KR5c0166_006:008a:10:17:1

其反也，¶
